description.@en: As you blow the pulverized remains of bones from your previous victims, they reform in the air, taking shape as shards and whorl about.

criticalFailure.@en: The bones blow about in the wind, until they reform. As they coalesce, a violent Restless Spirit arises to take its vengeance upon you. This Phantom will arise immediately somewhere within sight and seek to kill you.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but foes also cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes who can see and hear you equal to your [WB]. They each must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or be made Harried. While Harried, they immediately suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] physical Peril when their Turn begins. In addition, they cannot use ranged weapons for Actions in Combat.

reagents.@en: Powdered bone shards of a person you have Slain!, blown into the air (expended)
